TypeSignature.Value: public class Hyperlink : System.Windows.Documents.Span, System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource, System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
.class public auto ansi Hyperlink extends System.Windows.Documents.Span implements class System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource, class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class Hyperlink Inherits Span Implements ICommandSource, IUriContext
public ref class Hyperlink : System::Windows::Documents::Span, System::Windows::Input::ICommandSource, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext
type Hyperlink = class inherit Span interface ICommandSource interface IUriContext

summary.span: 提供用于在流内容中承载超链接的功能的内联级别的流内容元素。

span.span: An inline-level flow content element that provides facilities for hosting hyperlinks within flow content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现属性， 该属性是在单击超链接时应导航到的内容的。 implements the property that you set with the of the content that should be navigated to when the Hyperlink is clicked. 仅当的直接或间接父级是导航宿主（包括、 或可承载 xbap 的任何浏览器（包括 Internet Explorer 6 及更高版本，以及 Firefox）时，才会发生导航。2.0 +）。 navigation can only occur, however, if either the direct or indirect parent of a is a navigation host, including , , or any browser that can host XBAPs (which includes Internet Explorer 6 and later versions, and Firefox 2.0+). 有关详细信息，请参阅[导航概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md)中的**导航宿主**主题。For more information, see the **Navigation Hosts** topic in [Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md). 为子内容强制实施强内容模型。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 有关内容模型的详细信息，请参阅[TextElement 内容模型概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)。See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the content model. 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示元素的简单用法。The following example shows simple use of a element. [!code-xaml[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUriXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_hyperlink_navurixaml)] 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式创建。The following example shows how to create a programmatically. [!code-csharp[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUri](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_hyperlink_navuri)] [!code-vb[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUri](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_hyperlink_navuri)]

summary.span: 获取或设置激活 时要导航到的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets a URI to navigate to when the is activated.

value.span: 激活时要导航到的 URI。

span.span: The URI to navigate to when the is activated.
The default is .

para.span: 仅当的直接或间接父项是导航宿主（包括、 或可承载 xbap 的任何浏览器（包括 Internet Explorer 6 和更高版本和 Firefox 2.0 +）。

span.span: can navigate to the value of the property only if either the direct or indirect parent of a is a navigation host, including , , or any browser that can host XBAPs (which includes Internet Explorer 6 and later versions, and Firefox 2.0+).

para.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅导航概述中的导航主机部分。

span.span: For more information, see the Navigation Hosts section in Navigation Overview.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要链接到特定的内联元素，请指定前面带有井号（#）的元素名称。To link to a particular inline element, specify the element name preceded by a pound symbol (#). 当用户将鼠标悬停[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]在中时 ，存储在属性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]中的将显示在状态栏中。When a user hovers the mouse over a in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] stored in the property is displayed in the status bar. 当用户[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 单击时，导航到此。 navigates to this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] when the user clicks the . 如果在用户单击和后续导航请求之前，属性的值发生更改， 则将忽略属性的新值并导航到作为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]值的当用户单击时的 。If the value of the property changes after the user clicks the and before the subsequent navigation request, ignores the new value of the property and navigates to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that was the value of the property when the user clicked the . > [!NOTE] > 你不能仅使用来执行导航。You are not restricted to only using a to do navigation. 还可以使用附加属性，但只能从以下项中使用： 、、 和。You can use the attached property as well, but only from the following: , , , and . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 元素的属性。The following example shows how to use the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUriXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_hyperlink_navurixaml)] 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUri](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_hyperlink_navuri)] [!code-vb[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUri](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_hyperlink_navuri)] 下面的示例演示如何使用**mailto：** [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]打开一个新邮件窗口，其中包含电子邮件地址、电子邮件地址和主题，以及电子邮件地址、主题和正文。The following example shows how to use a **mailto:**[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to open a new mail window that contains an email address, an email address and a subject, and an email address, subject, and body. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationMailToSnippet#MailToMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationMailToSnippet/CS/HomePage.xaml#mailtomarkup)]

summary.span: 处理 路由事件。

span.span: Handles the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法导航到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] 属性指定的，并将标记为 " [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]已访问"。This method navigates to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] specified by the property, and marks the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] as visited. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 Internet 区域中，不允许某些形式的导航（例如，导航到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unc](~/includes/tlasharptla-unc-md.md)]路径），这取决于主机计算机的安全性配置。Depending on the host computer's security configuration, certain forms of navigation (for example, navigating to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unc](~/includes/tlasharptla-unc-md.md)] path) are not allowed in the Internet zone. 在这种情况下，此方法将要求完全信任。In such cases, this method will demand full trust. 有关详细信息，请参阅[代码访问安全性](~/docs/framework/misc/code-access-security.md)。For more information, see [Code Access Security](~/docs/framework/misc/code-access-security.md).
